ActivityStreamStatus.title: Activity Stream Status
ActivityStreamStatus.description: The status of the database activity stream

AllocatedStorage.title: Allocated Storage
AllocatedStorage.description: The amount of storage allocated to the DB instance in GB

AssociatedRoles.title: Associated Roles
AssociatedRoles.description: The IAM roles associated with the DB instance

AutoMinorVersionUpgrade.title: Auto Minor Version Upgrade
AutoMinorVersionUpgrade.description: Whether minor version upgrades are applied automatically

AvailabilityZone.title: Availability Zone
AvailabilityZone.description: The Availability Zone where the DB instance is located

BackupRetentionPeriod.title: Backup Retention Period
BackupRetentionPeriod.description: The number of days to retain automated backups

CACertificateIdentifier.title: CA Certificate Identifier
CACertificateIdentifier.description: The identifier of the CA certificate for the DB instance

CertificateDetails.title: Certificate Details
CertificateDetails.description: Details about the certificate associated with the DB instance

CharacterSetName.title: Character Set Name
CharacterSetName.description: The character set name for the DB instance

CopyTagsToSnapshot.title: Copy Tags To Snapshot
CopyTagsToSnapshot.description: Whether to copy tags to snapshots

DBInstanceArn.title: ARN
DBInstanceArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the DB instance

DBInstanceClass.title: Instance Class
DBInstanceClass.description: The compute and memory capacity of the DB instance (e.g., db.t3.micro, db.m4.xlarge)

DBInstanceIdentifier.title: DB Instance Identifier
DBInstanceIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the RDS DB instance

DBInstanceStatus.title: Status
DBInstanceStatus.description: The current status of the DB instance

DBName.title: Database Name
DBName.description: The name of the initial database

DBParameterGroups.title: DB Parameter Groups
DBParameterGroups.description: The parameter groups associated with the DB instance

DBSecurityGroups.title: DB Security Groups
DBSecurityGroups.description: The security groups associated with the DB instance

DBSubnetGroup.title: DB Subnet Group
DBSubnetGroup.description: The subnet group associated with the DB instance

DbiResourceId.title: DBi Resource ID
DbiResourceId.description: The unique resource identifier for the DB instance

DatabaseInsightsMode.title: Database Insights Mode
DatabaseInsightsMode.description: The database insights mode for the DB instance

DedicatedLogVolume.title: Dedicated Log Volume
DedicatedLogVolume.description: Whether dedicated log volume is enabled

DomainMemberships.title: Domain Memberships
DomainMemberships.description: The domain memberships for the DB instance

EnableIAMDatabaseAuthentication.title: IAM Database Authentication Enabled
EnableIAMDatabaseAuthentication.description: Whether IAM database authentication is enabled

Endpoint.title: Endpoint
Endpoint.description: The connection endpoint for the DB instance

Engine.title: Engine
Engine.description: The database engine type (e.g., mysql, postgres, oracle-ee)

EngineVersion.title: Engine Version
EngineVersion.description: The version of the database engine

EnhancedMonitoringResourceArn.title: Enhanced Monitoring Resource ARN
EnhancedMonitoringResourceArn.description: The ARN of the enhanced monitoring resource

InstanceCreateTime.title: Instance Create Time
InstanceCreateTime.description: The time when the DB instance was created

Iops.title: IOPS
Iops.description: The number of IOPS for the DB instance

IsStorageConfigUpgradeAvailable.title: Storage Config Upgrade Available
IsStorageConfigUpgradeAvailable.description: Whether storage configuration upgrade is available

KmsKeyId.title: KMS Key ID
KmsKeyId.description: The KMS key identifier for encryption

LatestRestorableTime.title: Latest Restorable Time
LatestRestorableTime.description: The latest time to which the DB instance can be restored

LicenseModel.title: License Model
LicenseModel.description: The license model for the DB instance

MasterUsername.title: Master Username
MasterUsername.description: The master username for the DB instance

MonitoringRoleArn.title: Monitoring Role ARN
MonitoringRoleArn.description: The ARN of the monitoring role

MultiAZ.title: Multi-AZ
MultiAZ.description: Whether the DB instance is deployed in multiple Availability Zones

NetworkType.title: Network Type
NetworkType.description: The network type for the DB instance

OptionGroupMemberships.title: Option Group Memberships
OptionGroupMemberships.description: The option group memberships for the DB instance

Port.title: Port
Port.description: The port number for the DB instance

PubliclyAccessible.title: Publicly Accessible
PubliclyAccessible.description: Whether the DB instance is publicly accessible

ReadReplicaDBInstanceIdentifiers.title: Read Replica DB Instance Identifiers
ReadReplicaDBInstanceIdentifiers.description: The identifiers of read replica DB instances

SecondaryAvailabilityZone.title: Secondary Availability Zone
SecondaryAvailabilityZone.description: The secondary Availability Zone for Multi-AZ deployments

StorageEncrypted.title: Storage Encrypted
StorageEncrypted.description: Whether the DB instance storage is encrypted

StorageThroughput.title: Storage Throughput
StorageThroughput.description: The storage throughput for the DB instance

StorageType.title: Storage Type
StorageType.description: The storage type of the DB instance

Tags.title: Tags
Tags.description: The tags associated with the DB instance

VPCSecurityGroups.title: VPC Security Groups
VPCSecurityGroups.description: The VPC security groups associated with the DB instance
